title: NFL Games
text:
Latest on NFL games.
*Note: The spread and total deltas are deltas compared to the line.
Purple spread means bet the favorite as the system thinks the favorite is undervalued.
Green spread means bet the underdog as the system thinks the underdog is undervalued.
Orange total means bet the over as the system thinks the over is undervalued.
Blue total means bet the under as the system thinks the under is undervalued.

title: betting
text:
This is very beta. I don’t really know what I’m doing on the tech side of things.
The point of this is to compare expert (supposedly) projections with current odds and exploit the differences.
Use the tabs at the top for new data.
I’m not responsible for lost money; I will take credit for winnings.
